title: Ie Naki Ko (Movie)
synopsis: Remi, an orphan kid gets hired out to a traveling street entertainer Vitalis when her foster parents fall on hard times.
staff: [['Dezaki, Osamu', ['Director']], ['Sugino, Akio', ['Character Design']], ['Watanabe, Takeo', ['Music']], ['Malot, Hector-Henri', ['Original Creator']]]
